Description: Default numerical format string for KPIs and Info. For system defaults leave this blank.
Maximum length of lookup text displayed on chart cursors (0 = No lookup text displayed).
Maximum number of Groups initially retrieved for display. Additional Groups can be shown by clicking 'Show More' (250 max).
Maximum number of KPIs, Charts and Tables initially retrieved for display. Additional KPIs, Charts and Tables can be shown by clicking 'Show More' (250 max).
Maximum number of KPIs initially retrieved for display as a KPI Map. Additional KPIs can be shown by clicking 'Show More' (500 max).
Fixed number of columns displayed on a KPI Map. A setting of System will attempt a best fit algorithm.
Maximum number of Groups initially retrieved for display as a Group Map. Additional Groups can be shown by clicking 'Show More' (200 max).
Maximum number of bars displayed for dynamic Pareto Charts given a large enough screen (5 min and 50 max).
Maximum number of recently used profiles shown in profile list (3 min and 10 max).
